examples.example: 热情友好的留学生们积极融入当地文化，收获了丰富的体验和珍贵的友谊。

translate.english: Enthusiastic and friendly international students actively integrate into the local culture and gain rich experiences and precious friendships.

examples.example: 留学生们在校园里积极参加各种活动，展现出了青春的活力与风采。

translate.english: International students actively participate in various activities on campus, showing the vitality and style of youth.

examples.example: 许多留学生都热衷于参加各类公益活动，为社会贡献着自己的力量。

translate.english: Many international students are keen on participating in all kinds of public welfare activities and contributing their own strength to the society.
